short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bright and stylish new tab extension with popular characters on your desktop. Great and easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For all fans and geeks! 
Bright and stylish new tab extension on your desktop. Get it installed and enjoy new tab theme with favorite characters.
This extension changes default new tab of your browser to Rick and Morty theme. It also set range of quick links to surf Internet fast and easy.
